articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday, met and had a talk in a compatriotic atmosphere with a congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) led by Chairman of the Nishi Tokyo Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan Ko Tok U at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.

articles.title: Russian Ambassador and Military Attache Host Reception
articles.content:
Russian Ambassador and Military Attache Host Reception
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Ambassador Alexandr Matsegora and Military Attache Alexei Bartusov of the Russian embassy here gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club Thursday to mark the Day of Defenders of the Motherland.
					 Present there on invitation were Army Col. General Kim Hyong Ryong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, generals and officers of the Korean People's Army, officials concerned, and representatives and military attaches of foreign embassies here.
					
					 Staff members of the Russian embassy were on hand.

articles.title: KNPC Spokesman Blasts U.S.-Japan War Drills
articles.content:
KNPC Spokesman Blasts U.S.-Japan War Drills
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korean National Peace Committee in a statement Thursday accused the U.S. and Japanese warmongers of staging "combined air-defence and missile-shielding drill" from Feb. 16 under the pretext of tackling "threats" from the DPRK's ballistic rocket and fighters.
					 The exercises which will last until Feb. 23 reportedly include the inspection of the system for joint detection, tracking and interception of the DPRK's ballistic rockets and fighters through the coordinated operation of the air-defence network of the U.S. and Japan, and also the interception drill of Patriot missile units under the Japan Air "Self-Defense Force" and the emergency sortie drill of its fighters.
					
					 The recent drill assumes greater bellicosity and danger as its scope has been expanded as never before with the involvement of the Japan Air SDF and U.S. marines and air force units as well as the Japan Maritime SDF and units of the U.S. navy.
					
					 Branding this as a ferocious gangster-like act aimed to tarnish the hard-won atmosphere for the improvement of the north-south ties and for peace on the Korean peninsula, and as a dangerous military provocation to ignite the train of a war, the statement said:
					
					 The American empire is a heinous rogue state which seeks to maintain a military edge and achieve its hegemonic ambition under the signboard of "defence of allies" in Asia-Pacific. The islanders of Japan are crafty men eyeing militarist revival and the materialization of their old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere" with the help of the U.S. master.
					
					 The reckless war hysteria of the U.S. and Japan proves who the chieftain standing against Korea's reconciliation and unity and harassing peace on the Korean peninsula is.
					
					 We will never remain an onlooker to the gangsters about to brandish swords.
					
					 The U.S. and Japanese reactionaries should not run wild, mindful that if they dare provoke the DPRK which has towered as a nuclear power in the East, a world-level strategic state, not properly facing up to the changed world, that will only endanger their security and existence.

articles.title: Japan Can Never Evade Responsibility for Crime of Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
Japan Can Never Evade Responsibility for Crime of Sexual Slavery
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Ri Hye Yong, a researcher at the Human Rights Division of the DPRK Institute of International Studies, Thursday issued an article titled "Japan Can Never Evade Responsibility for Crime of Sexual Slavery".
					 When people come up with the words "sexual slavery", they call to mind a country, called Japan, the article said, adding:
					
					 That is because Japan is the most despicable and audacious country in the world, which in the first half of the last century forced hundreds of thousands of women from Korea and several other countries into the humiliating sexual slavery and neither felt the slightest remorse nor reflected on its past for over a century.
					
					 Nevertheless, Japan recently keeps harping on "championing women's empowerment" deceitfully in the international arenas including the UN. What is worse, it impudently seeks to cover up its past crime by paying a trivial sum of money.
					
					 The article cited data to disclose that the sexual slavery was a crime of organized and massive abuse of women's right, perpetrated by the Japanese government and military from its contrivance to the execution as a state policy. 
					
					 It went on: 
					
					 Japan is bent on refusing to recognize its legal and moral state responsibility for the sexual slavery. Underlying it is its intention to repeat its history of aggression and crime by training not only the rising generations but also all its citizens in the spirit of revanchism and militarism. 
					
					 For that reason, the international community vehemently denounces the Abe government for making frantic efforts to repeat Japan's crime-ridden past by turning Japanese citizens into brutes in human skin again. 
					
					 However strongly it advocates "women's human rights" and whatever cunning tricks it employs, Japan cannot cover up its past crimes for the sexual slavery--the A-class state-sponsored crime against humanity that has left an indelible mark in mankind's history. 
					
					 If Japan refuses to reflect honestly on the nation's wrongful past and make a sincere apology for its past crime, it will continue to be subjected to strong international condemnation and it cannot evade the responsibility for the disgraceful crime of sexual slavery.

articles.title: Paektusan Prize Sports Games Go on in DPRK
articles.content:
Paektusan Prize Sports Games Go on in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Prize Sports Games are going on in the DPRK in celebration of the Day of the Shining Star, leader Kim Jong Il's birth anniversary (February 16).
					 They are bringing together more than 3 500 athletes from across the country. The athletes are competing in 11 events, including football, basketball, volleyball and speed skating.
					
					 Women's basketball matches are drawing attention of the experts and fans.
					
					 The Pyongyang Sports Team beat the Amnokgang Sports Team on Feb. 3. The sports team of Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University overpowered the Kigwancha Sports Team, a powerhouse, by 20-odd points.
					
					 The Kigwancha Sports Team reduced points in volleyball game with the Sobaeksu Sports Team which took the second place in the DPRK Championships last year.
					
					 Good results were also made in football, table-tennis, handball and other events. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the Taesongsan Sports Team finished first in the ice hockey game held at the sports village of the area of Mt Paektu in Samjiyon County, Ryanggang Province.

articles.title: Success Made in Forest Restoration Campaign
articles.content:
Success Made in Forest Restoration Campaign
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK have achieved successes in the three-year forest restoration campaign.
					 In February Juche 104 (2015) respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un made public a famous work "Let the Entire Party, the Whole Army and All the People Conduct a Vigorous Forest Restoration Campaign to Cover the Mountains of the Country with Green Woods", which serves as a banner encouraging all the army and people to the grand nature-remaking project.
					
					 The first-phase tasks for the forest restoration campaign were carried out in the country.
					
					 After the construction of the land- and manpower-saving tree nursery, a model in the work to put the sampling production on a scientific, industrial and intensive basis, mother tree nurseries were built or remodeled in different parts of the country to produce billions of saplings.
					
					 17 mother tree nurseries were reconstructed in Kangwon Province and one hundred and dozens of mother tree nurseries built or rebuilt in Kanggye and Kimchaek cities, Thaechon, Mundok, Riwon and other counties. Thousands of hectares of sapling production areas were expanded and hundreds of thousands of hectares of forests created.
					
					 Pyongyang and Rason cities and Jagang and North and South Phyongan provinces fulfilled their plans for afforestation on an annual basis, while North Hwanghae and South Hamgyong provinces and Nampho City ensured the rooting rate of trees at over 90 percent by using various biological activators.
					
					 A national commanding system was perfected to prevent forest fires from breaking out; many observatories and mobile monitoring posts have been established and fire companies organized in the provinces, cities and counties (districts). 
					
					 The Academy of Forest Science under the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection cultivated oil-bearing trees and other high-yielding varieties of trees and established a technology of dense planting. Forest science institutes and forest administration units made valuable achievements. More than 160 efficient machines were introduced into the forest restoration campaign.

articles.title: U.S. Mulls Deploying Latest Attack Drones in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Mulls Deploying Latest Attack Drones in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists are going to deploy latest Grey Eagle drones at units of their aggression forces in south Korea by early March, according to reports from south Korea.
					 They openly claim that the drones equipped with precision guided bombs and missiles target the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its major objects in contingency.
					
					 The U.S. persistent introduction of new war equipment is aimed to spoil the atmosphere for improvement of the north-south relations and extremely aggravate the situation on the Korean peninsula and thus ignite a war of aggression on this land.

articles.title: Juche Idea Lauded in DR Congo
articles.content:
Juche Idea Lauded in DR Congo
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- It is a clear proof of the validity and vitality of the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and enriched by leader Kim Jong Il that its adherents are steadily increasing in number.
					 Andre Lohekele Kalonda, chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of the DR Congo, said this at the inaugural ceremony of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea for Independence in DR Congo held in Kinshasa on Feb. 8.
					
					 They are pleased to see the emergence of one more Juche idea study group in DR Congo on the occasions of the 76th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il and the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army, he said, adding:
					
					 Visiting the DPRK several times, I witnessed the indomitable Korean people vigorously advancing, thwarting the vicious anti-DPRK sanctions and pressure moves of the hostile forces by dint of self-reliance and self-development.
					
					 It is our bounden duty to intensify the study and dissemination of the Juche idea illumining the road ahead of the human cause of independence and extend firm support and solidarity to the Korean people in the struggle to defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country and socialism.

articles.title: Juche Idea Study Group Formed in DR Congo
articles.content:
Juche Idea Study Group Formed in DR Congo
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The Group for the Study of the Juche Idea for Independence in DR Congo was inaugurated in Kinshasa on February 8.

articles.title: Pyongyang Declaration Signed by Venezuelan Party
articles.content:
Pyongyang Declaration Signed by Venezuelan Party
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The Tupamaro Revolutionary Movement of Venezuela signed the Pyongyang Declaration "Let Us Defend and Advance the Cause of Socialism".
					 Its National Leadership made it clear in a letter sent to the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on Feb. 15.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced in Czech Republic
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced in Czech Republic
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association posted the full text of President Kim Il Sung's work "On the Occasion of the Founding of the Korean People's Army" on its website on February 4.
					 The work, published on February 8, Juche 37 (1948), is an immortal great programme as it proclaimed the birth of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and indicated the tasks for developing the KPA into the invincible people's armed forces, a revolutionary regular army.
					
					 The website carried a photo of the President.

articles.title: Tablets to Honor Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Unveiled in Russia
articles.content:
Tablets to Honor Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Unveiled in Russia
Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Tablets to honor President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il were displayed at the Russia-DPRK Friendship House in Khasan of Russia on February 15 with due ceremony on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il.
					 Engraved on the tablets are letters in Korean and Russian reading "Russia-DPRK Friendship House where Comrade Kim Il Sung, President of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, visited on July 1, 1984 and July 6, 1988" and "Russia-DPRK Friendship House where Comrade Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, visited on August 18, 2001 and August 24, 2002".
					
					 The participants in the ceremony laid bouquets and flowers before the tablets.
					
					 The director of the Bureau for International Cooperation of the Maritime Territory Administration and other speakers said that the ceremony is of weighty significance in the development of the bilateral relations.
					
					 Stressing that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il provided a solid foundation for the friendly relations between the two countries, they hoped that the bilateral relations of friendship would grow stronger.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were personages from various units, including the Maritime Territory Administration, the Far East Railway Bureau and the mission of the Foreign Ministry in Vladivostok, and masses of Russia and the DPRK consul general and consuls in Vladivostok and officials concerned.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con grupo de felicitacion de coreanos residentes en Japon
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con grupo de felicitacion de coreanos residentes en Japon
Pyongyang, 22 de febrero (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, departio hoy en un ambiente fraternal en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el grupo de los coreanos residentes en Japon, de visita en la patria para felicitar el Dia de la Estrella Luz, encabezado por Ko Tok U, presidente de la Direccion de Nishi Tokyo de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon.

articles.title: Vocero de CNCDP condena fiebre belica de EE.UU. y Japon
articles.content:
Vocero de CNCDP condena fiebre belica de EE.UU. y Japon
Pyongyang, 22 de febrero (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz publico el dia 22 una declaracion con respecto a que los belicistas yanquis y japoneses desarrollan desde el dia 16 el "entrenamiento combinado de defensa antiaerea y de misiles" bajo el pretexto de hacer frente a la "amenaza" de los cohetes balisticos y los cazas de la RPDC.
					Segun el documento, se realiza en el marco del simulacro programado hasta el dia 23 el chequeo del sistema para detectar, perseguir e interceptar en conjunto los cohetes balisticos y los cazas de la RPDC mediante la operacion coordinada de las redes antiaereas de EE.UU. y Japon. Y se llevan a cabo a la vez los ejercicios de interceptacion de las unidades de misiles PAC-3 y el despegue urgente de los cazas, pertenecientes a las "Fuerzas Aereas de Autodefensa" de Japon.
					
					A diferencia del ano pasado cuando tomaron parte solamente las unidades de las "Fuerzas Maritimas de Autodefensa" de Japon y otras norteamericanas, se movilizaron en la presente version hasta las "Fuerzas Aereas de Autodefensa" de Japon y las unidades de la infanteria de marina y las fuerzas aereas de EE.UU. De esta manera, se amplio considerablemente la dimension del simulacro cuyo caracter belicista y peligroso se hizo mas fuerte. 
					
					Tales movimientos aventureros devienen un acto gangsteril encaminado a congelar el ambiente de la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas y de la paz de la Peninsula Coreana, preparado a duras penas, y ademas una provocacion militar peligrosisima para desatar la guerra.
					
					Es precisamente el imperio americano el Estado gangsteril que se desespera por mantener la supremacia militar y lograr su codicia hegemonica bajo el rotulo de la "proteccion de sus aliados" en la region de Asia-Pacifico. A su vez, los taimados reaccionarios japoneses se valen de la fuerza de su amo norteamericano para lograr la resucitacion del militarismo y realizar su vieja ilusion de la "esfera de coprosperidad de la gran Asia oriental". 
					
					La histerica furia belica de EE.UU. y Japon demuestra otra vez quien impide la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion coreana y perturba la paz de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					No estaremos con brazos cruzados ante las maniobras militares de los enemigos.
					
					EE.UU. y los reaccionarios japoneses deben portarse con prudencia al tener bien presente que dara peligro a sus seguridades y subsistencias la imprudente ofensiva a la RPDC, emergida como potencia nuclear del Oriente y Estado estrategico de talla mundial.

articles.title: Tiene lugar la reunion de funcionarios de restauracion forestal y proteccion ambiental
articles.content:
Tiene lugar la reunion de funcionarios de restauracion forestal y proteccion ambiental
Pyongyang, 22 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 21 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la reunion de los funcionarios del dominio de recuperacion forestal y proteccion territorial y ambiental.
					Participaron en la ocasion Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado y primer ministro de la RPDC, O Su Yong y otros cuadros directivos del partido y el gobierno, los funcionarios de los ministerios y organos centrales y de las instituciones del partido y el poder en las provincias, ciudades y distritos y los del dominio referido y otros vinculados.
					
					Asistieron tambien Pak Yong Sik y otros funcionarios de los organismos de las fuerzas armadas.
					
					En la ocasion se hizo balance del cumplimiento de las tareas de la primera etapa de la campana de reforestacion y de los exitos y lecciones adquiridos en el ano pasado en la movilizacion general de administracion territorial y se discutieron los remedios para lograr mayores exitos en las mismas obras del ano en curso.
					
					Se proyectaron los videos relativos al cumplimiento de las tareas mencionadas y a la movilizacion general para la administracion territorial del ano pasado.
					
					Se presentaron los exitos alcanzados en los trabajos para acondicionar bien las avenidas y aldeas a las alturas de la potencia civilizada socialista y proteger los recursos maritimos y los patrimonios culturales nacionales.
					
					Durante las intervenciones, quedaron analizados y balanceados los defectos reportados el ano pasado.

articles.title: Japon no puede eludir de responsabilidad de crimen de esclavitud sexual, subraya Ri Hye Yong
articles.content:
Japon no puede eludir de responsabilidad de crimen de esclavitud sexual, subraya Ri Hye Yong
Pyongyang, 22 de febrero (ACNC) -- La investigadora del Centro de Estudio de los Derechos Humanos del Instituto de Estudio de los Asuntos Internacionales de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Hye Yong, hizo publica el dia 22 un articulo intitulado "Japon no puede liberarse para siempre de la responsabilidad de crimen de esclavitud sexual", que subraya en particular:
					Japon es un infame pais criminal que en la primera mitad del siglo pasado, impuso a cientos de miles de mujeres coreanas y de otros paises del mundo el ignominioso destino de esclava sexual y hasta la fecha no siente remordimiento ni hace introspeccion.
					
					En estos dias, Japon habla a menudo en la ONU y otras escenas internacionales de la "defensa de los derechos humanos de las mujeres" y actua cinicamente para encubrir sus delitos pasados con un punado de dineros.
					
					La esclavitud sexual de Japon es un crimen de violacion de los derechos humanos de las mujeres, de caracter organizativo y colectivo, aplicado como una politica estatal bajo el directo patrocinio del gobierno y la capa militar desde su invencion hasta su implementacion. 
					
					Partiendo de su malsana intencion de repetir la historia de agresion y crimenes del pasado al insuflar el revanchismo y el militarismo a los miembros de la nueva generacion y otros habitantes japoneses, el pais isleno niega obstinadamente la responsabilidad juridica y moral del Estado sobre el crimen en cuestion.
					
					Por esta razon, la sociedad internacional condena severamente a los compinches de Abe que hacen esfuerzos desesperados por reproducir la historia pasada al convertir otra vez a todos los japoneses en la banda de bestias con piel humana.
					
					Aunque se vale de todos los medios hablando ruidosamente de los "derechos humanos de las mujeres", Japon no podra encubrir su archi-crimen estatal antietico, que se registro en la historia humana.
					
					Si no hace la disculpa sincera y reflexiones del Estado sobre sus crimenes del pasado, Japon sera condenado y rechazado para siempre por la sociedad internacional y no podra liberarse de la responsabilidad del vergonzoso crimen de esclavitud sexual.
